creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: bracelet, one of a pair, closed cuff style without side openings; top and bottom edges have chain in rope-like design applied around cuff; center: floral motifs with ball in center, alternating with rows with spiral motif; motifs in diagonal rows are made with fine chain
title: Bracelet, one of a pair
